Verses: 1 manupuththirane, Nee Oru Sengalai Eduththu, Adhai Unmun Vaiththu, Adhin Mel Erusalem Nagaraththai Varaindhu,

2 adharku Virodhamaaga Mutrikkai Pottu, Adharku Virodhamaagak Koththalangalaik Katti, Adharku Virodhamaaga Manmedupottu, Adharku Virodhamaaga Raanuvangalai Niruththi, Sutrilum Adharku Virodhamaaga Madhilidikkum Yandhirangalai Vai.

3 melum Nee Oru Iruppuchchattiyai Vaangi, Adhai Unakkum Nagaraththukkum Naduvaaga Iruppuchchuvaraakki, Adhu Mutrikkaiyaaik Kidakkumpadikku Un Mugaththai Adharku Neraaith Thiruppi, Adhai Mutrikkaipottukkondiru; Idhu Isravel Vamsaththukku Adaiyaalam.

4 nee Un Idadhupakkamaai Orukkaliththup Paduththu, Adhinmel Isravel Vamsaththaarin Akkiramaththai Sumaththikkol; Nee Andhappakkamaai Orukkaliththirukkum Naatkalin Lakkaththinpadiye Avargaludaiya Akkiramaththai Sumappaai.
5 avargaludaiya Akkiramaththin Varushangalai Unakku Naatkanakkaai Ennak Kattalaiyitten; Munnootruththonnooru Naatkalvaraikkum Nee Isravel Vamsaththaarin Akkiramaththai Sumakkavendum.

6 nee Ivaigalai Niraivetrinapinbu, Marupadiyum Un Valadhupakkamaai Orukkaliththu, Yoodhaa Vamsaththaarin Akkiramaththai Naarpadhunaal Varaikkum Sumakkavendum; Ovvoru Varushaththukkuppadhilaaga Ovvoru Naalai Unakkuk Kattalaiyitten.
7 nee Erusalemin Mutrikkaikku Neraagath Thiruppiya Mugamum, Thirandha Buyamumaaga Irundhu, Adharku Virodhamaagath Theerkkadharisanam Sollu.
8 idho, Nee Adhai Mutrikkaippodum Naatkalai Niraivetrumattum Oru Pakkaththilirundhu Marupakkaththil Puralak Koodaadhapadikku Unnaik Kayirugalaal Kattuven.

9 nee Kodhumaiyaiyum Vaarkodhumaiyaiyum Perumpayatraiyum Sirupayatraiyum Thinaiyaiyum Kambaiyum Vaangi, Avaigalai Oru Paaththiraththile Pottu, Avaigalaal Unakku Appanchuduvaai; Nee Orukkaliththup Padukkum Naatkaludaiya Lakkaththinpadiye Munnootruththonnoorunaal Adhil Eduththu Saappiduvaayaaga.
10 nee Saappidum Pojanam, Naal Ondrukku Irubadhu Sekkal Niraiyaayirukkum; Appadi Naalukkunaal Saappiduvaayaaga.
11 thanneeraiyum Alavaai Hin Ennum Padiyil Aariloru Pangaik Kudippaai; Appadi Naalukkunaal Kudippaayaaga.
12 adhai Vaarkodhumai Adaiyaippol Saappiduvaayaaga; Adhu Manushanilirundhu Kazhindha Kashtaththin Varattigalaal Avargal Kangalukku Munbaaga Sudappaduvadhaaga.
13 adharku Oththapadiye Isravel Puththirar, Naan Avargalaith Thuraththugira Purajaadhigalukkulle Thangal Appaththaith Theettulladhaaga Saappiduvaargal Endru Karththar Sonnaar.

14 appozhudhu Naan: Aa, Karththaraagiya Aandavare, Idho, En Aaththumaa Theettuppadavillai; Thaanaai Seththadhaiyaavadhu, Peerundadhaiyaavadhu Naan En Siruvayadhumudhal Idhuvaraikkum Saappittadhillai; Aruvaruppaana Iraichchi En Vaaikkutpattadhumillai Endren.
15 appozhudhu Avar Ennai Nokki: Paar, Manusha Kashtaththin Varattikkup Padhilaaga Unakku Maattuchchaani Varattiyai Kattalaiyidugiren; Adhinaal Un Appaththai Suduvaayaaga Endraar.
16 pinnum Avar; Manupuththirane, Idho, Appamum Thanneerum Avargalukkuk Kuraiyavum, Avanavan Thidukkidavum, Avargal Thangal Akkiramaththile Vaadippogavum,
17 naan Erusalemile Appam Ennum Aadharavukolai Murikkiren; Avargal Appaththai Niraiyinpadiye Visaaraththode Saappittu, Thanneerai Alavinpadiye Thidukkidudhalode Kudippaargal.
